newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia total vehicle sales up 6.5 pct in July.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia total vehicle sales up 6.5 pct in July.

text.p: Total vehicles sales in Malaysia rose 6.5 percent year-on-year in July to 29,174 units from 27,394 units, the Malaysian Motor Traders' Association (MMTA) said on Tuesday.
But sales of passenger cars, including four-wheel drive vehicles, dipped 3.3 percent to 21,751 units in July 1996 from 22,501 units a year ago, the group said.
Demand for commercial vehicles, including four-by-four vehicles, grew 51.7 percent year-on-year to 7,423 units from 4,893, the statement said.
Sales of passenger vehicle cars including four-by-fours totalled 21,750 units in June 1996, while commercial vehicles including four-by-fours amounted to 7,009 units in the same month.
The total number of vehicles sold in Malaysia during June 1996 was 28,759, the group said.
